name: Project Cold Heat
description:
In this short point'n'click, you play as two siblings taken captive by a laboratory. One possesses the power of ice, the other can heat things up. And they want to escape.

  • The game is in French.
  • The game is only playable using the mouse. Use the left click to select elements and change the cursor by scrolling down the wheel. In the menus, the click may not work well; try then to click on the left up corner of the item.
  • I do not own the music used in this game. All credits go to Marco Beltrami (Water Supply), HyperDuck Soundworks (Cirelian Trials Ambience) and Koji Kondo (Shadow Temple)

Game made on Adventure Game Studio.
